has research problem.from sentence: Modelling Interaction of Sentence Pair with Coupled- LSTMs

has research problem: modelling the interactions of two sentences

has research problem.from sentence: Recently , there is rising interest in modelling the interactions of two sentences with deep neural networks .

has research problem: modelling the relevance / similarity of the sentence pair

has research problem.from sentence: Among these tasks , a common problem is modelling the relevance / similarity of the sentence pair , which is also called text semantic matching .
